name: Julia Gamze Subasi
information:
Born in 2000

There was a bunch of people waiting for me

Then grew up in Istanbul then in Istanbulland

And no, no magic wand

That came later when the real dreams started

Was hard because you need to be wholehearted.

Life went on stress came in between and changed everything

The everyone thought i look like a growing-up woman

I mostly was alone because the people did not want to have to do with me

But it does not matter - it made me who I am - you seeâ€¦

When I was 18 I went to Indonesia, the Bali part, and after that came back to Turkey again

There was my first love who cheated which was not so smart

Then kept going my career in Falconeri which is a famous exclusive fashion brand, and worked as a manager assistant for 1.5 years.

I had a lot of work experience up to the age of 18-20, of course I ate the apples later... :) ( I'm sure you will see it )

In 2021 back to Bali after pandemi and had life for a year in there again.

There it was pretty hard to learn new mentalities - real achesâ€¦

From there I had changes in my career and started in a HR department as an IT Recruiter 

But I loved it 
Although careers look different, they provide support to each other.

I returned to Turkey again and continued to work remotely.

I got an offer from the company I used to work with and I still continue as a Stylist.

And now I'm in Turkey since-2022 and I want to be here for a while.

I can design and sew clothes, I have 3d metaverse designs. I dress people and I love it.

Would love to go away - even to another planet - but that will show; is not yet nearâ€¦

So - hopefully you are happy now, because i was sincere

But the rest is mine and i keep that to myself because that is my sphereâ€¦

Happy Travels!

name: Selin Ozkan
information: Selam! Ben su anda 20 yasindayim ve Polonya'da Biyoteknoloji okuyorum. Bu alanda kendimi gelistirmek tabiki de isterim ama asil size basvuru amacim bir sekilde danismanlik vermek istemem. Ben bu ise basladigimda (2 yil once) danismanlik sirketleri 2000 euro istiyordu. Cok fazlaaarastirma sonucunda danismanlik sirketleri haricinde de gelebilirsiniz burayaa okumaya ama gitmek istediginiz ulkede halihazirda konaklayan birinin olmasi basvuru surecinde kesinle fazlaca guven veriyor. Ben kendi ulkemde universite egitiminin bir analami olmadigini dusunerek yurtdisi egitim firsatlarini arastirmaya basladim ve polonya bu isin en ucuzu su an. turkiyedeki ozel universitelere gore cok cok daha fazla ucuza denk geliyor ama danismanligin bu kadar fazla olmasi cok sacma geliyor. Kanalinin kitlesi genel olarak lise universite ogrencileri diye dusunuyorum. Belki tamamen lisans-master icin belki de erasmus icin fazlasiyla yardimci olabileceigimi dusunuyorum. Insanlara bir sey katabilirsem cok memnun olurum. Su anda bir yerde calismadigim icin bir referans linki koyamiyorum ama degerlendirmeye alinirsam gercekten memnun olurum. Sadece insanlara yardim etmek amaciyla degil ayni zamanda da bu sekilde biyoteknoloji/biyoloji/genetik vs alaninda ekibinize katilacak insanlar olursa onlardan da yardim almak isterim.
